mapper.insert: insert into property_user (id, group_id, property_id, user_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{propertyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update property_user set group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, property_id = #{propertyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, group_id, property_id, user_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time from property_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
